front.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Information Technology--Telecommunications and Information Exchange Between Systems--Local and Metropolitan Area Networks--Specific Requirements--Part 3: Carrier Sense Multiple Access With Collision Detection (CSMA/CD) Access Method and Physical Layer Specifications (Revision of IEEE Std 802.3-2005 Including All Approved Amendments)

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This draft is a revision of IEEE Std 802.3-2005, as modified by approved amendments IEEE Std 802.3an-2006 10GBASE-T, IEEE Std 802.3aq 2006 10GBASE-LRM and IEEE Std 802.3as-2006 Frame Expansion, approved corrigendum IEEE Std 802.3-2005/Cor 1-2006 DTE Power Isolation and the balloted amendment IEEE P802.3ap Backplane Ethernet as well as the content of draft IEEE Std 802.3-2005/Cor 2-2007 10GBASE-T. Clause 43 Link Aggregation, and related material, has been extracted to the IEEE P802.1AX draft.
